snippet: The leader of Egypt made scurrilous comments nearly three years ago about Jews and Zionists, which just came to light. Does he still believe what he said?
abstract: Editorial contends scurrilous comments made by Egyptian Pres Mohamed Morsi in 2010 about Zionists and Jews, which have just come to light, raise serious doubts about whether he can ever be force for moderation and stability.
lead_paragraph: The leader of Egypt made scurrilous comments nearly three years ago about Jews and Zionists, which just came to light. Does he still believe what he said?

headline.seo: President Morsi’s Repulsive Comments Against Jews
